mapper.sql: BATCH_NO, COUNT, POLICY_NO, CLAIM_TYPE, LN_ACCT, APPL_NO, LN_AMT, LN_TERM, CLAIM_AMT, PRIN_AMT, INT_AMT, LC_AMT, PREM_DATE, INSU_COMPANY, APPROVE_STATUS,IS_HOLIDAY
mapper.insert: insert into PSP_CLAIM_APPROVE_RECODE (BATCH_NO, COUNT, POLICY_NO, CLAIM_TYPE, LN_ACCT, APPL_NO, LN_AMT, LN_TERM, CLAIM_AMT, PRIN_AMT, INT_AMT, LC_AMT, PREM_DATE, INSU_COMPANY, APPROVE_STATUS, IS_HOLIDAY ) values (#{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lnTerm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{claimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prinAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{intAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lcAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHoliday,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update PSP_CLAIM_APPROVE_RECODE
COUNT = #{count,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POLICY_NO = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIM_TYPE = #{claimType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LN_ACCT = #{lnAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LN_AMT = #{lnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LN_TERM = #{lnTerm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLAIM_AMT = #{claimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRIN_AMT = #{prinAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INT_AMT = #{intAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LC_AMT = #{lcAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PREM_DATE = #{premDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSU_COMPANY = #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HOLIDAY = #{isHoliday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PSP_CLAIM_APPROVE_RECODE set COUNT = #{count,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, POLICY_NO = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLAIM_TYPE = #{claimType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LN_ACCT = #{lnAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LN_AMT = #{lnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LN_TERM = #{lnTerm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLAIM_AMT = #{claimAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIN_AMT = #{prinAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INT_AMT = #{intAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LC_AMT = #{lcAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PREM_DATE = #{premDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSU_COMPANY = #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOLIDAY = #{isHoliday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.list_serno,a.transfer_req,t.term,t.cover_end_date from lst_iqp_info t,LST_IQP_SEAL a where a.list_serno=t.list_serno and t.business_source = 'PAPH' and t.cover_create_status = '04' and t.prd_id = '05210306' and a.input_time < '2019-09-05' order by a.input_time desc
